profile.name: Guido van Rossum
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft | Database Sharding & Type Checking Expert
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with 8+ years of experience in developing scalable and maintainable software systems. Passionate about database sharding, type checking, and open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed high-performance databases using Python and C++
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable data architectures
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for database sharding and type checking

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to various open-source projects, including cpython, pythonlabs, and abc-unix
Developed and maintained multiple Python libraries, such as asyncio and pytype

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including ballot-box and mirror-cwi-stdwin
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve code quality
